full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SHER PHYIN MA LA BRTEN NAS BKRU BYABS BSRUNG GSUM BYED TSUL NYON MONGS BDUD RTZI'I CHU BZHUGS S+HO, ,
